How can I verify the safety of the Verus software downloads for different operating systems?

You can verify the safety of the Verus software downloads for different operating systems, such as MacOS, Linux-x86-64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows, by checking the VirusTotal detection links provided. These links will show the results of virus scans from multiple antivirus engines, which can help ensure that the downloads are free from malware.
